meanings.definition: relating to the body as opposed to the mind
meanings.sent1: She preferred physical activities like running and swimming.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended regular physical exercise for a healthy body.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how he always chooses physical games over board games.
meanings.sent4: Her physical presence in the room was commanding and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The physical pain from the injury was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: He had to undergo annual physicals to monitor his health.
meanings.sent2: The school requires students to have a physical before joining sports teams.
meanings.sent3: The physical revealed no issues, much to his relief.
meanings.sent4: Getting a physical can help catch health problems early.
meanings.sent5: She scheduled her physical for next week to stay proactive about her well-being.

meanings.sent1: The artist used various physicals like clay and wood to create sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled different physicals for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The physicals on the table needed to be sorted and organized.
meanings.sent4: The physical of the new product was impressive and well-designed.
meanings.sent5: The physical of the building stood out in the city skyline.
